divs: sighting detailson thursday night there were 2 aircrafts flying in circles over manhattan...one of them was flying uptown\the other downtown...they look triangular shape from my angle...with flashing lights, different pattern(green light in the front(pulsing light)and red and white lights on each end of the wings(flashing). also they had another set of lights, but less bright...they remind me to the murrysville ufos that you can watch in youtube...the comercial traffic at the time of the event was normal...they spent about more or less 4 hrs doing this. also they were black helicopters flying very low with their tail lit only by a red light. no more lights on them...the next morning i saw one of them (early morning)flying very low over the river...this one was black, no logo, and i think it was a uh-60 black hawk or something similar to it(i think they were military helicopters)...i'm surprised that no one else has reported this....
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around October 22nd 2009
